summary:
### **Monthly Operating Report Summary (June 2025)**  

#### **Key Operational & Financial Highlights:**  
- **Mass Market Electricity & Gas Sales:**  
  - 410 GWh (vs. 416 GWh in June 2024)  
  - Netback: **$146.32/MWh** (vs. $126.34/MWh in June 2024)  
- **Wholesale Business:**  
  - Contracted electricity sales: **810 GWh** (vs. 795 GWh in June 2024)  
  - Net revenue: **$186.08/MWh** (vs. $167.12/MWh in June 2024)  
  - Unit generation cost (incl. acquired): **$54.27/MWh** (vs. $54.53/MWh in June 2024)  
- **Futures Pricing (Otahuhu, Q4-2025):**  
  - **$138.3/MWh** (as of 15 July 2025) vs. $133.05/MWh (30 June 2025)  
- **Hydro Storage (14 July 2025):**  
  - South Island: **95% of mean**  
  - North Island: **148% of mean**  
- **Renewable Projects Under Construction:**  
  - Glenbrook BESS (Q1-CY26, **$163m**)  
  - Kowhai Park Solar (Q2-CY26, **$273m**)  
  - Te Mihi Geothermal (Q3-CY27, **$712m**)  
- **M&A Costs:**  
  - **$17.9m** unallocated costs for proposed **Manawa acquisition** ($10.9m transaction, $6.9m integration).  

No material capital markets activity (e.g., raising, halt) identified.
